title: Update member roles to include all motorcycle club ranks

requirements.text: Expand the backend Member type's role field to support all standard motorcycle club ranks: President, Vice President, Road Captain, Secretary, Sergeant at Arms, Treasurer, Enforcer, Tail Gunner, Chaplain, Prospect, and Member

Existing members with current roles remain unaffected
